title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Discover the ultimate solution to your insect infestation woes with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster! This incredible product comes in a set of 3 pre-baited, ready-to-use packs, each measuring 30 feet in length. The perfect choice for both indoor and outdoor use, these non-toxic traps are safe for use around children and pets.

The Giant Fly Glue Trap boasts a durable, green-colored barn paper sheet with a super-sticky adhesive that effectively eliminates pesky insects. Its pleasant scent lures unwanted pests, while its intelligent pest management approach ensures long-lasting results. These disposable traps are field-condition tested and proven to withstand damp and humid areas, making them ideal for residential, commercial, industrial, barn, waste room, and animal farm environments.

With a massive coverage area of 3600 square inches, the Giant Fly Glue Trap can handle even the most high-infestation areas. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that these reliable traps are effective for up to one full year in normal conditions, providing you with long-lasting protection against insect invasions.

Say goodbye to pesky insects and hello to a pest-free environment with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster â€“ your go-to solution for intelligent pest management!
